articles.author: L'EQUIPE
articles.title: Les femmes n'auront plus le droit de faire du sport en Afghanistan, affirme un dirigeant des Talibans
articles.description: Les Talibans n'entendent pas autoriser les femmes à jouer au cricket ou à pratiquer tout autre sport, a affirmé le chef adjoint de la commission culturelle des talibans à un média australien.
articles.content: Dans une interview accordée à SBS News, le chef adjoint de la commission culturelle des talibans, Ahmadullah Wasiq, a déclaré que les femmes afghanes ne seront pas autorisées à pratiquer des sports, … [+1019 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: The Taliban Will Ban Women's Sports in Afghanistan, a Report Says
articles.description: A Taliban spokesperson has been quoted as saying that women's sports — and women's cricket specifically — will be banned in Afghanistan.
articles.content:
SYDNEY — Australia’s SBS TV has quoted a Taliban spokesperson as saying that women’s sports — and women’s cricket specifically — will be banned by his group in Afghanistan.
“In cricket, they might f… [+2681 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
